about_the_game:
Step into the paws of an extraordinary feline hero in Cat Cleans Ocean. In this serene adventure, you embody a cat in a high-tech astronaut suit, on a gentle mission to cleanse a polluted section of the ocean, restoring its natural beauty and safeguarding marine life.

As you glide through the tranquil depths, you’ll explore six distinct regions, each presenting its own peaceful challenges. From volcanic pollution rocks to gentle pollution eruptions, your journey will be one of calm resolve and thoughtful problem-solving.

You’re equipped with an array of soothing tools to help in your quest:

  • Trash Magnet: With a handy net to scoop up trash, keeping the ocean pristine.

  • Vacuum Gun: Small yet powerful, perfect for gently sucking up scattered pollutants.

  • Doddy the Drone: Your trusty companion, enhancing your exploration and cleanup efforts.

  • Pollution Vacuum: A specialized tool for tackling those pesky pollution eruptions.

  • Laser Gun: Gently dissolves the toughest pollution rocks with ease.

  • Magnetic Gun: Effortlessly maneuvers metallic debris to designated disposal areas.

  • Upgraded Vacuum Gun: Doubles your cleaning speed, making large-scale cleanups a breeze.



Starting with modest equipment, your dedication and hard work will earn you resources to upgrade your tools, enhancing your efficiency and effectiveness. Each cleaned region brings you one step closer to a cleaner, healthier ocean.

Join the peaceful mission against ocean pollution and embark on an adventure that combines relaxation, strategy, and care. Will you rise to the challenge and become the ultimate ocean-cleaning hero? Dive in and unwind with Cat Cleans Ocean!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Pentium（R）Core E2210@2.20GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: In Cat Cleans Ocean Demo, play as a cat in an astronaut suit on a serene mission to clean a polluted ocean. Explore the first regions, using your trusty tool the vacuum cleaner and Doddy the Drone to collect all the trash from the first region. Relax, strategize, and restore the ocean’s beauty.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
